resources.string: Safe, clean and sweet tasting tap water

The Netherlands and Amsterdam got the safest and cleanest tap water in Europe. It actually tastes sweet as no chlorine is used to clean it. The quality of Dutch drinking water was top rated by a comparative research published in Science Magazine 2016/02 Vol. 351!

Drinking water to stay hydrated is cool, buying bottled water is lame. The effects of bottled water are devastating. Bring your own re-usable bottle and enjoy best quality tap water, always cooled and refreshing!
Water fountains: Waternet, Dunea, Join the Pipe, PWN
